message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn. Let's be realistic, this is a better deal for both of us considering the inflation.

The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.

Alice, let's be sensible. This offer is the most beneficial for you given the rapidly increasing inflation.  Any further delay will only hurt you more.
I'll try to meet you halfway, but I still want a bit more
Alice, this is it. A 50/50 split is the only fair deal at this point. Don't let the inflation eat away any more of your potential gain.
